* TOFFEES from Codechef

*/
//Coded on 28 April 2015
#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;

int main() {
    int t;
    long long a,i,j,n,max,min;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    { 
       cin>>n;
       cin>>a;
       min=max=a;
       for(i=1;i<n;i++)
        {
         cin>>a;
         if(a<min){ min=a; }
         else if(a>max){ max=a; }
        } 
       
       if(max-min>=2) cout<<"BAD"<<endl;
       else cout<<"GOOD"<<endl;
                     
    }
	return 0;
}
